com.punchline.javalib.entities.components.render

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchline.javalib.entities.components.render.Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, Renderable

    public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    Component wrapper for a LibGDX Animation.
    Author:
    Nathaniel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture,
         com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion animationRegion,
         int frameCols,
         int frameRows,
         float frameDuration)
        Constructs an Animation.
        Parameters:
        texture - The Animation's texture.
        animationRegion - The region on the texture which contains the complete animation.
        frameCols - The amount of columns in the animation.
        frameRows - The amount of rows in the animation.
        frameDuration - The duration of each frame, in seconds.

         int frameCols,
         int frameRows,
         float frameDuration)
        Constructs an Animation.
        Parameters:
        textureHandle - A FileHandle pointing to the texture.
        frameCols - The number of columns in the animation.
        frameRows - The number of rows in the animation.
        frameDuration - The duration of each frame, in seconds.
